00029 #if !defined(LOOS_MATRIX_ORDER_HPP)
00030 #define LOOS_MATRIX_ORDER_HPP
00031 
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <cassert>
00034 #include <stdexcept>
00035 
00036 #include <loos_defs.hpp>
00037 
00038 namespace loos {
00039 
00040   namespace Math {
00041 
00042     // These are the policy classes for the Matrix class.  They define
00043     // how the data is actually stored internally, i.e. lower
00044     // triangular, column major, or row major order...
00045     //
00046     // Basically, they store the physical size of the matrix and convert
00047     // 2D matrix coords to a single index.
00048 
00049   
00051 
00054     class Triangular {
00055     public:
00056       explicit Triangular() : m(0), n(0), s(0) { }
00057       explicit Triangular(const uint y, const uint x) : m(y), n(x), s( (y*(y+1))/2 ) {
00058         assert(y == x && "Cannot have a non-square triangular matrix...  (you know what I mean!)");
00059       }
00060 
00061       ulong size(void) const { return(s); }
00062 
00064       ulong index(const uint y, const uint x) const {
00065         uint b = y;
00066         uint a = x;
00067 
00068         if (x > y) {
00069           b = x;
00070           a = y;
00071         }
00072       
00073         return( (b * (b + 1)) / 2 + a );
00074       }
00075 
00076     protected:
00077       
00079 
00080       void setSize(const uint y, const uint x) {
00081         assert(y == x && "Cannot have a non-square triangular matrix...  (you know what I mean!)");
00082         m=y; n=x;
00083         s = (y*(y+1))/2;
00084       }
00085 
00086     
00087     protected:
00088       uint m, n;
00089       ulong s;
00090     };
00091 
00093     class ColMajor {
00094     public:
00095       explicit ColMajor() : m(0), n(0), s(0) { }
00096       explicit ColMajor(const uint y, const uint x) : m(y), n(x), s(y*x) { }
00097 
00098       ulong size(void) const { return(s); }
00099 
00101       ulong index(const uint y, const uint x) const {
00102         return(x*m + y);
00103       }
00104 
00105     protected:
00107 
00108       void setSize(const uint y, const uint x) { m=y; n=x; s = y*x; }
00109 
00110     protected:
00111       uint m, n;
00112       ulong s;
00113     };
00114 
00115 
00117     class RowMajor {
00118     public:
00119       explicit RowMajor() : m(0), n(0), s(0) { }
00120       explicit RowMajor(const uint y, const uint x) : m(y), n(x), s(y*x) { }
00121 
00122       ulong size(void) const { return(s); }
00123 
00125       ulong index(const uint y, const uint x) const {
00126         return(y*n + x);
00127       }
00128 
00129     protected:
00131 
00132       void setSize(const uint y, const uint x) { m=y; n=x; s=y*x; }
00133 
00134     protected:
00135       uint m, n;
00136       ulong s;
00137     };
00138 
00139   }
00140 
00141 }
00142 
00143 #endif
